mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sd_sum, sd_date, mem_id from( SELECT sd_sum, prod_name, mem_id, sd_date FROM sale_dis sale JOIN sale_list salelist ON sale.sd_id = salelist.sd_id JOIN prod prod ON salelist.prod_id = prod.prod_id WHERE sd_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2018-09-10','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2018-09-24','YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 AND sale.mem_id = #{mem_id} ORDER BY sale_sum DESC)

SELECT prod_name, COUNT(1) FROM sale_dis sale JOIN sale_list salelist ON sale.sd_id = salelist.sd_id JOIN prod prod ON salelist.prod_id = prod.prod_id WHERE sd_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2018-09-10','YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2018-09-11','YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 AND sale.mem_id = #{mem_id} GROUP BY prod_name RDER BY prod_name ASC;
